website_summaries.verdict: Large FHD screen, speedy processor, and top of the line features make this an excellent choice for gamers and those seeking a better computing experience.
pros: 17.3-inch screen with 9th-gen Intel i7 processor and 16 GB memory
The NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1660 Ti graphics processor delivers an incredible gaming experience
FHD display with 60Hz refresh rate means no detail is missed
cons: Heavier than most laptops, at almost 6.4 lbs
Some models had issues with Windows upgrades and compatibility

customer_reviews.title: The specs are not right.
customer_reviews.text: It says it has a 144hz screen it does not it only has a 60 Hz screen which is a mood killer for me! I'm sure the computer would be great for someone who doesn't play video games but it does have enough power to do everyday things.
customer_reviews.author: Zack Creech

customer_reviews.title: The screen is not 144hz
customer_reviews.text: The laptop seems ok apart from the fact that it doesn't have a 144Hz panel, only a 60Hz panel. This is a big deviation from the specs, and really is a deal breaker. I'll be returning it as soon as I can get a different laptop.
customer_reviews.author: J. Sondag

customer_reviews.title: Mine worked for about 3 days - then battery issues
customer_reviews.text: the price was unbeatable, I loved it but after 3 days, it started to have issues, working with HP they determined that the battery was defective and its why it would fail calibration and only last 5 minutes when unplugged. My only option was to ship the notebook to hp and have it back in 4 - 6 weeks or return it. I returned mine. Touch screen 1 star - this model didnt have touch for gaming it was great* keyboard was AWEFUL - the rgb lighting,, 3 zones, not per key. it has sharp corners and edges, not very nice to the touch at all. the sharp edges on the palm rest dig into your wrists,arm.
customer_reviews.author: 420_in_MA

customer_reviews.title: Started smoking on the first use
customer_reviews.text: Laptop arrived today. Had it on getting everything set up and for a few hours and suddenly it shut off and started smoking near where the power cable plugs in. I've done absolutely nothing that requires any intense processing. I will append to the review and revise depending on how support for this goes. Obviously this is a manufacturer's problem. Edit: It is worth noting that Amazon is taking the return and paying for the shipping, since the laptop was defective. I won't raise the rating because the product was junk, but Amazon has been excellent in handling it.
customer_reviews.author: Paulette Matteson

customer_reviews.title: Though the Specs are wrong, still an amazing laptop
customer_reviews.text: Though the specs say this has a 144hz monitor, it is 60hz. but for some that is not a huge deal-breaker. Everything runs and looks amazing. Yes the screen is 1080p but it works and looks wonderful. The fans are not super load and I have not had any issues of overheating. The omen center is so user friendly and easy to play around with the lights on the keyboard. The only downside that I have found is the keyboard seem a little cramped. But not something that would really hurt most. And having small hands it really isn't that bad. I have had this laptop for about 2 weeks now and I could not be happier with it.
customer_reviews.author: Crassandra Haskell

customer_reviews.title: Most horrible buying experience
customer_reviews.text: I thought this was supposed to have two(2) m.2 slots. I bought this "new" to open it up to upgrade it to find it missing parts. This is a major defect and I got absolute no help at all too. This was a $1,500.00 order and I felt like I got brush aside like it wasnt a big deal. This has been by far the worst buying experience I have ever had in my whole life. If I could give zero stars I would. I posting this review so that others check to make sure yours have all the parts there!
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Chavez

customer_reviews.title: Fun and fast
customer_reviews.text: I'm quite happy with it. It does what I want. I play WoW on it. It's probably overkill but I don't care. It's so much faster than anything I've used before. My only issue is that the sound isn't great. Luckily for me it's not a huge issue.
customer_reviews.author: Lady Jane

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy - Hideous  - worse POS
customer_reviews.text: 1. Have had to restore defaults 2x - as it keeps deleting the wireless drive - yeah WTF 2. Speakers at highest volume are basically a wisper 3. Graphics on say Call of Duty ghost are absolute sh*t. Jumpy, and Res sucks Actually purchased for processing power and 10key number pad Runs statistical programs and sci computing Ok but nothing special. Graphics are less impressive than a standard mac book pro especially when manipulating multi-d models
customer_reviews.author: Shannon O'Donovan of O'Donovan consulting

customer_reviews.title: it's kind of lie
customer_reviews.text: it was said that this is a 144hz laptop but actually it's only 60hz.
customer_reviews.author: Hieu

customer_reviews.title: Computer
customer_reviews.text: Computer works perfect for what I needed it for. Game work awesome
customer_reviews.author: lassie

customer_reviews.title: GE Force 2060, 17" screen under $1500
customer_reviews.text: I love this gaming computer. the lighted back light keys is the bomb. no more having to get a light.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

product_meta.title: Omen by HP 2019 17-Inch Gaming Laptop, Intel i7-9750H, NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2060 (6 GB), 16 GB RAM, 512 GB Solid-State Drive, VR Ready, Windows 10 Home (17-cb0070nr, Shadow Black)
product_meta.description:
Upgrade to the sleek, portable OMEN 17 laptop. Powerful NVIDIA® GeForce RTX™ graphics and a 9th generation Intel® Core™ i7 processor for taking on the most demanding AAA game titles and handling everyday tasks. Crisp and smooth visuals nested in a narrow bezel display that delivers edge-to-edge immersion. This PC is ready for virtual reality gaming with DTS: x Ultra for surround sound in your headphones, and HP Audio Boost dual speakers custom-tuned by Bang & Olufsen. Play all day with advanced thermal cooling solutions that vent hot air out of the rear Corners with a 3-phase motor. Maintain and upgrade your system with single-panel access and monitor your vitals and prioritization from OMEN Command center. 
Stunning desktop-grade power in a sleek, portable design keeps you playing your best wherever gaming takes you. Take on the most demanding AAA game titles with NVIDIA® GeForce RTX 2060™ graphics and a 9th generation Intel i7-9750H Hex Core processor. Immerse yourself in smooth gameplay on a narrow-bezel display.
- The OMEN 17 laptop's sleek, modern design engineered to produce desktop-grade power. With an advanced thermal cooling solution and single-panel access to the internals for easy upgradeability, nothing stops you from playing at your best.- the crisp gameplay is crucial if you want to play at your best. With a high resolution and fast refresh rate, on-screen visuals are Swift and smooth, while a narrow bezel display delivers edge-to-edge immersion.- get the power of a desktop on your laptop. With a 9th generation Intel Core processor, NVIDIA GeForce graphics, and accelerated storage, nothing holds you back.- experience a breakthrough in processor performance that delivers incredible in-game experiences and enables crisp, simultaneous live-streaming. Edit and render pure 4K quality, and stream only the best content.- designed to run more efficiently and more reliably at faster speeds, DDR4 is the future of RAM. With its higher bandwidth, everything from multi-tasking to playing games gets a performance boost.
feature_bullets: Cutting-edge gaming performance: play The latest games, including Fortnight, PUBG, and Overwatch, from anywhere—without sacrificing performance
Omen command center: easily turn up your performance with included software that enables control over your CPU overclocking settings and prioritizes your gaming traffic to minimize latency
Super Fast Processor: 9th Generation intel(r) core(tm) i7-9750h Processor, 6-Core, 2.6 GHz Base frequency, up to 4.5 GHz Base with Intel's) Turbo Boost Technology for superior gaming performance

Easy to upgrade Memory and storage: 16 GB DDR4-2666 SDRAM (upgradable with 2 accessible Memory Slots) and Fast boot-up, file transfer and a snappier experience with the internal with 512 GB pcie(r) nvme(tm) M.2 Solid State Drive
Bios recovery and protection: automatically checks the health of your PC, protects against unauthorized access, secures local storage and recovers itself from boot-up issues
Ports: headphone/Microphone combo, Microphone jack, 3 USB 3.1 Type-A, 1 RJ-45, 1 HDMI 2.0, 1 Mini displayport(tm), 1 USB 3.1 Type-C(tm), 1 media card Reader
Battery life: up to 5 hours and 30 minutes (mixed usage); up to 3 hours and 15 minutes (video playback); up to 2 hours and 45 minutes (wireless streaming)
Dimensions AND weight (unpackaged): 15.94 inches (W) x 11.22 inches (D) x 1.06 inch (H); 7.09 pounds
Operating System and Warranty: Windows 10 Home and 1-Year Limited hardware warranty with 24-hour, 7 days a week Web support when shipped from and sold by Amazon.Com and not a third party seller

Desktop-grade power in a portable laptop with realistic graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2060 (6 GB GDDR6 dedicated). Bring the power of real-time Ray tracing and AI-enhanced Graphics to your gaming. Virtual and Mixed Reality-ready. 17.3-Inch diagonal FHD IPS WLED-backlit edge-to-edge display (1920 x 1080) with 60Hz refresh rate
